name: @fooloomanzoo/datetime-picker
description: A picker for date and time, that prefers to use the native input. It includes a calendar and a timer.

scripts.prepublish: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "publish new version" && npm version patch && git push
scripts.gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git pull && bower update -f && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push && git checkout master
scripts.build: git pull && bower update && npm run analyze
scripts.analyze: polymer analyze -i datetime-picker.html date-picker.html time-picker.html datetime-picker-mixin.html overlay-datetime-picker.html overlay-date-picker.html overlay-time-picker.html time-element.html calendar-element.html > analysis.json
